Package net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns

Class Summary
Finger Class Finger is used to retrieve local user information from a remote aglet server.
FingerInfo The FingerInfo class defines the Finger Information.
FingerSlave FingerSlave is a aglet of Slave pattern that moves to a remote site and backs to the original site with information.
FingerWindow Class FingerWindow represents the main window for user interaction
GeneralDialog The GeneralDialog class is a common and generic dialog to display the messages.
MessageDialog The MessageDialog class is a common and generic dialog to display the messages
MessagePanel The MessagePanel class is a common and generic dialog to display the messages
PopUpMessageWindow Class PopUpMessageWindow is a popup window for error messages.
SampleAglet This class abstracts a stationary master aglet for the verious samples in this package.
SampleWindow Class DemoWindow abstracts an interactive window for demos.
Watcher Class Watcher is used to check the update of a file located in a remote aglet server.
WatcherNotifier WatcherNotifier class is a aglet for the file update notification.
WatcherWindow Class WatcherWindow represents the main window for user interaction with the Watcher.
Writer Class Writer is used to display a message on a remote aglet server.
WriterSlave WriterSlave is a aglet of Slave pattern that moves to a remote site and displays a message
WriterSlaveWindow  
WriterWindow Class WriterWindow represents the interaction window with the Writer.
